title: Minister Lamamra meets with Ugandan counterpart
text: As part of his participation in the 42nd session of the Executive Council of the African Union, the Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Ramtane Lamamra, held today in Addis Ababa a bilateral meeting with his Ugandan counterpart, Mr. Odongo Jeje Abubakar.

On this occasion, the two parties discussed bilateral relations, as well as ways and means of their consolidation, in the perspective of the preparation of the next bilateral events, including the state visit scheduled soon in Algeria of the President of the Republic of Uganda, Mr. Yoweri Museveni, at the invitation of his brother, the President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune.
The two ministers also discussed the main items on the agenda of the current session of the Executive Council, as part of the traditional consultation and coordination between the two countries.
